chunked_vad.lyrics_text: She'd take the world off my shoulders If it was ever hard to move She'd turn the rain to a rainbow When I was living in the blue
If it was ever hard to move She'd turn the rain to a rainbow When I was living in the blue Why then, if she is so perfect
She'd turn the rain to a rainbow When I was living in the blue Why then, if she is so perfect Do I still wish that it was you?
When I was living in the blue Why then, if she is so perfect Do I still wish that it was you? Perfect don't mean that it's working
Why then, if she is so perfect Do I still wish that it was you? Perfect don't mean that it's working So what can I do? (Ooh)
Do I still wish that it was you? Perfect don't mean that it's working So what can I do? (Ooh) When you're out of sight
Perfect don't mean that it's working So what can I do? (Ooh) When you're out of sight In my mind
So what can I do? (Ooh) When you're out of sight In my mind 'Cause sometimes I look in her eyes
